name: Par-King
description:
Par-King

Par-King is a competitive party game where players race to reach certain parking spots. Players operate as food delivery workers competing to deliver and pick up orders across the comic-stylized city. Use powerups to thwart your fellow players, climb parking garages to gain a vantage point, and crash into other cars as you make your way to victory!

Dynamic Gameplay

A constantly moving parking spot, multiplayer gameplay, and powerups create a different gameplay experience every match.

Vertical Map Design

A map full of twists, turns, dips, and ramps has the players flinging themselves off of parking garages onto skyscrapers and off of overpasses into downtown.

Unpredictable Powerups

A varied selection of powerups gives players the opportunity to make creative attempts to secure their parking spot.

Unique Soundtrack

A fun and upbeat soundtrack inspired by classic games that conveys a lighthearted, party atmosphere.

Made for GAME 390 and 391, Fall 2020 and Spring 2021

Tyler Wiebe (project manager + programming)

Logan Smith (creative lead)

Jessi Nickel (art lead)

Justin van Heek (programming lead)

Nathan Ahrendt (programming)

Anthony Nootebos (music + sound design)

Nicolas Perez (art + design)

Peidong Fan (design + QA)

Ariel Chihan Caballero (art)
